description: This file contains function declarations for utility functions related to parameter retrieval and instance number management in a data model, specific to the Cosa (Cisco Object Session Architecture) API. It is a header file defining function signatures and includes licensing information.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueUlong
methods.description: Retrieves an unsigned long parameter value given its name.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueString
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value given its name, buffer, and size.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueBool
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value given its name.

methods.name: CosaGetInstanceNumberByIndex
methods.description: Retrieves the instance number for a given object name and index.
